Configured TypeScript with strict compiler options
Integrated Tailwind CSS 3.3.0 with PostCSS pipeline
Set up ESLint with Next.js recommended rules
Created root layout with metadata API usage

approach_outcome.configuration_completeness: 100% - All essential configuration files created and properly configured

recommendations.recommendation: Create a components directory structure (e.g., src/components/ui, src/components/features) to organize React components as the project grows
Create .env.example file documenting all required and optional environment variables with descriptions
Add pre-commit hooks (using husky) to run lint and type-check before commits to catch issues early
Consider creating a custom Tailwind theme (colors, spacing, fonts) in theme.extend to establish consistent design system
Set up testing framework (Jest + React Testing Library) and add test scripts to package.json
Create README.md with project overview, setup instructions, and development workflow
Monitor and optimize Core Web Vitals as features are added; consider Image optimization components early
